channel.title: Halo 2 Modding
channel.description:
Well, this is a work in progress. Currently, there are not many tutorials out there that have good quality video's and written tutorials. So I am creating these myself along with the help of a friend Cup_A_Noodles. (He is at another website I'm at :P) There are only 10 FINISHED ones at the moment, I have another 15 or 20 that are awaiting Noodles final touch ;) So enjoy some of these tutorials and I would like some feedback on them, lemme know what they need. I am aiming for completely noob proof. Thx Ron for lettin me do this :)
Ok, so here's how it's gonna be. There's going to be [b]2[/b] links to every tutorial. One link will be [b][u]JUST[/b] the video. The other will be to the website which I posted these on with the full tutorial. (Written, Video, and Video Download will be in there) To watch the video, You just click on the link. I would recommend size 800 or "Original" for best quality. If you want the full tutorial at the website, you may have to register. Now the only reason im doing this is so that I'm not posting 10 different topics in here giving Ron a hastle with his "All Tutorial Links" topic ;D But if there seems to be a problem with it, I will do that. Finaly...the tutorials...
[b]Note:[/b] May have to watch it on IE, this is putfile just to let you know. And depending on your internet connection, it may take 30 seconds - 2 min for it to start. Sorry, but it's the best quality video host.
[b]Change The Starting Weapon :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1765]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Change-The-Starting-Weapon]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Creating A PPF Patch :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1763]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Creating-A-PPF-Patch]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Everyone Can Superjump :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1761]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Everyone-Can-Superjump]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Fully Auto Weapons :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1760]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Fully-Auto-Weapons-73]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]How To Superjump :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1744]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Superjump-27]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Invincibility :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1740]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Invincibility-46]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Replace Item's On Map :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1759]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Replace-Items-On-A-Map]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Shoot Character's Out Of A Weapon :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1758]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Shoot-Characters-Out-Of-A-Weapon]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Super Speed :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1745]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Super-Speed-37]Video Tutorial[/url] [b]Weapons Shoot Stickies :=[/b] [url=http://www.ub3rhack3r5.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=1743]Full Tutorial[/url] ----- [url=http://media.putfile.com/Weapons-Shoot-Stickies-70]Video Tutorial[/url]
That's all that are done at the moment. But feedback is great :) Hope you enjoy!
~GoD
[b]Ron: [/b] Editted out TUT in title. It's the tutorial section, it's implied.

item.title: Halo 2 Modding
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

if the site had more modders then it would be alright to keep up.

and im not sure of any good sites because some of them dont let me streem like putfile.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 2 Modding
item.dc:creator: @Omfgurweird Omfgurweird
item.description:
@Omfgurweird wrote:

I definently agree, and if mopar thinks it would be to hard to keep up with. I would gladly take care of that forum.

EDIT: Also, if you have any preferance on where else to host them. I wouldn’t mind uploading them again. It’s just that the quality of the video goes to shit on other hosts.

~GoD

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 2 Modding
item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

woops, accedetly deleted my post…

ok, these are good tutorials, andvery noob proof! i hate putfile so i downloaded them.

this forum wouldrock if it had a halo 2 or a xbox modding section.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 2 Modding

item.description:
@Omfgurweird wrote:

Well, this is a work in progress. Currently, there are not many tutorials out there that have good quality video’s and written tutorials. So I am creating these myself along with the help of a friend Cup_A_Noodles. (He is at another website I’m at :P) There are only 10 FINISHED ones at the moment, I have another 15 or 20 that are awaiting Noodles final touch So enjoy some of these tutorials and I would like some feedback on them, lemme know what they need. I am aiming for completely noob proof. Thx Ron for lettin me do this

Ok, so here’s how it’s gonna be. There’s going to be 2 links to every tutorial. One link will be [u]JUST the video. The other will be to the website which I posted these on with the full tutorial. (Written, Video, and Video Download will be in there) To watch the video, You just click on the link. I would recommend size 800 or “Original” for best quality. Now the only reason im doing this is so that I’m not posting 10 different topics in here giving Ron a hastle with his “All Tutorial Links” topic ;D But if there seems to be a problem with it, I will do that. Note: May have to watch it on IE, this is putfile just to let you know. And depending on your internet connection, it may take 30 seconds - 2 min for it to start. Sorry, but it’s the best quality video host.
